node.title: Join the Comedian Michelle Buteau at a Times Event on the ‘Joys’ of Parenting
node.description: Kick back and laugh about the trials and triumphs of raising tiny humans, with the comedian Michelle Buteau and Jessica Grose of The Times’s parenting newsletter at a virtual event on Dec. 8.
node.content: ["Once everyone\u2019s teeth are brushed, bedtime stories are read and foreheads are kissed, join the Times Opinion writer and mother Jessica Grose of the parenting newsletter for an all-virtual evening of comedy and commiseration.", "Parenting during the pandemic hasn\u2019t been easy, and we could all use a moment to share our funny, and occasionally perverse, parenting wins.", "We\u2019ll start off by hearing from Times subscribers like you about your \u201ctiny victories.\u201d After that, the comedian, actress and mom Michelle Buteau will provide some very relatable and hilarious insights on parenthood. And she\u2019ll answer your questions.", "So take a break with a night for everyone who is raising small humans.", "R.S.V.P. above."]
